rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall aligned with Vastu principles, open space for guests.
Spacious living room with Mediterranean style decor and ample natural light from north-facing windows.
Modern dining area integrated with the kitchen for easy entertaining; features high ceilings and Mediterranean accents.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with island countertop design, emphasizing functionality and style in line with luxury segment standards.
A comfortable family room for gatherings, adjacent to the living area.
Two-car garage integrated with a dedicated access from ground floor.
Private gym area designed for personal use, equipped with state-of-the-art fitness equipment and soundproofing in line with luxury preferences.
